attributes.action: Born and bred British citizens need better support and more help.
attributes.background:
People of Britain are struggling. 
Theirs not much support for people of certain ages including Young British citizens. 
People of Britain needs more help and more support. 
People are living on the streets, 
Young adults are getting into debt and struggling. Show your support for Britain.

rejection.details: We're not sure what kind of support you would like the Government to provide. If you could start a new petition with a clearer request for action, we could look at this again.
